findings.title: Possible DoS attack
findings.description: An attacker can send dozens of calls to the 'stakeFor' function providing the same 'to' address which could create a large array size and make '_getUserRewardInformationFor' inaccessible.

findings.title: Reading state variable in the loop
findings.description: The finding indicates that a state variable is being read within a loop, which can lead to unnecessary gas consumption and potentially cause issues with contract functionality.

findings.title: Iteration over unpredictable array length
findings.description: It is not recommended to iterate over an array of unpredictable length.
